short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested 25 CFSD Montreal by28 February 2025. Item 1, Indicator, Liquid Quantity Category: *Equipment \\u200b\\u200bProcurement
description:
The procurement involves a competitive bidding process for the acquisition of Aircraft Oxygen Equipment.

Item 1:  2 units of Indicator, Liquid Quantity to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal by February 28, 2025.

Item 2:  4 units of Indicator, Liquid Quantity to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal by February 28, 2025.

Interested suppliers are encouraged to use the epost Connect service to transmit their bids electronically.

Note: due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the Department is experiencing reduced business hours and limited staff availability.
tags: Guidelines for responding to virtual requests
